segments.text: Do you know that John isn't going to come back to our school ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He had moved and held a party on July 1st .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's a pity that I was traveling around Europe at that time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Even he's not coming back to school anymore , you still can call him and meet him on weekends .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're right ! I will call him this weekend and meet him .
segments.speaker: S2
